name: Cloud City Technician
Lore: 'Former Imperial technician disenchanted with the New Order. Sympathetic to the Alliance. His knowledge of Imperial computer systems makes him a valuable ally.',
Text: 'When present at a converted site, may use 2 Force to raise your site to the top. Also, when present at an opponent''s site that has a Scomp link, your Force drains are +1 there.',
